description: This delicious breakfast sandwich brings the spicy kick of jalapeno and siracha to really wake you up.
keywords: Sourdough bread,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Dairy free
name: Sourdough Sandwich with Jalapeno & Sriracha Eggs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a non-stick pan to a medium heat with the canola oil. Crack the eggs into the pan and fry for 4 minutes.
While the eggs are frying, toast the bread for 2 minutes. Place the fried eggs on the toast and drizzle with sriracha and seasoning to taste.
